video_prompt: Woman's face shifts subtly, lips part further, revealing teeth. Eyes blink, red eyeshadow catches light. Hair wisps move. Background remains stark white. Soft shadows dynamically define contours.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Close-up illustration of a woman's face, cropped from nose down, angled left to right side of head. Ethereal white skin, delicate hair wisps. Vibrant, glossy red lips partially open with white teeth. Striking brown eyes with long, voluminous black lashes. Bold red eyeshadow, meticulously drawn eyebrows. Soft lighting with subtle shadows, elegant and dramatic against a stark white background.
refined_video_prompt: Woman's face subtly shifts, lips parting further to reveal teeth. Eyes blink, red eyeshadow dynamically catches light. Hair wisps move. Soft shadows dynamically define contours across her face.
